attributes.action: Privatise the NHS and with proceeds invest into a government guaranteed fund to pay for vouchers for those who cannot afford treatment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The billions raised through privatisation of the NHS if invested into a government bond would annually pay through interest earned for vouchers for those who couldn't afford treatment. This would generate competition between NHS Trusts and reduce the need for taxation through National Insurance

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
